alert.note: Alert for Big Hole Mountains; Upper Snake River Plain (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 07 at 3:16PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Jefferson and southeastern Madison Counties through 345 PM MDT... At 316 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles east of Archer, or 13 miles southeast of Rexburg, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 35 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Jefferson and southeastern Madison Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...35 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Big Hole Mountains; Upper Snake River Plain
